page.title: 14ERITH HOSPITAL
page.content: Erith hospital is a cottage hospital, built in 1871. It accomodates a maximum of 31 patients in two wards at an approximate cost of Â£110 per week. There are 43 medical attendants and two ward sisters. Beds cost up to Â£600 to be fully equipped. An X-ray machine costs about Â£80,000 to buy and maintain. The hospital does not have a resident doctor, but the patients' own doctors come to attend to them. Erith Hospital depends mostly on donations from the Friends association and from schools.
